name: Late Fees
description:
A short game made with speed running in mind about getting yourself to the end of the levels and achieving the best time.

Made for the Mini Jam 9 - Back to School.

Limitation: Only use two buttons
Game was made with Xbox 360 controller. But added support for keyboard, but the base Xbox version only used 2 inputs (Left Stick and A Button).

Controls:
Keyboard:
WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump/Dash

GAMEPAD:
LEFT STICK - Movement
A - Jump/Dash

Follow along with more game being created like this over on my twitter

https://twitter.com/KingBit_Patrick
